backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining bilingual organization data models, access-controlled user profiles, projects, gallery, and content retrieval with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report containing a features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing Internet Computer deployment steps, hash-based routing, and post-deployment verification tasks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring TanStack Router with hash history, context providers, routes, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AboutUsEdi: Fetches and edits bilingual About Us content with tabs for English and Hindi, allowing updates via a form.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactMes: Displays contact form messages in a card list with sender details and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryMan: Manages gallery images including upload with bilingual captions, preview, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomePageIm: Handles uploading, captioning, and deleting images displayed on the home page.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Edits organization information including bilingual fields, contact details, mission, and logo upload/removal.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProjectsMa: Creates, edits, and deletes projects with bilingual titles, descriptions, and optional images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing bilingual organization info, contact details, social links, and logo with fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, logo fallback, language switcher, and admin authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides auth state, login/logout logic, and credential hashing using localStorage/sessionStorage.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Stores and persists the selected language and provides a simple translation helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, loading/storing identities, and exposing login state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating organization details, about content, projects, and gallery images through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays About Us content with language support and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements admin setup and login with validation, language support, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with auth gating, tab navigation, and custom domain validation for managing organization content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing organization info and a form that submits messages via API with language support.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays gallery images with captions, handling loading state and multilingual captions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, organization info, and recent activity images with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page offering navigation options and route shortcuts with multilingual text.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists all projects with images, titles, and descriptions, supporting English and Hindi.
frontend/src/utils/domainValidation.ts: Provides functions to validate and normalize custom domain names with detailed format checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests, including a pending request to deploy the website publicly.
